LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipToxicResistance: Set the toxic resistance for this animal Toxic resistance adjusts how strongly a creature is affected by toxic buildup
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinToxicResistance: Set a minimum toxic resistance for all animals
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxToxicResistance: Set a maximum toxic resistance for all animals
